Day 1 - March 5th, 2022

* Fly from Pittsburgh to Houston on F3660424 (Price: $389, DepTime: 18:25, ArrTime: 21:39, ActualElapsedTime: 2 hours 14 minutes)
* Check in at The Westin Houston Downtown (Cost: $160/night, Distance: 0.4 miles from Houston city center, Allows children under 10)
* Spend the evening exploring Houston's city center and enjoying dinner at one of its many restaurants

Day 2 - March 6th, 2022

* Take a self-driving car from Houston to Dallas (Duration: 3 hours 27 mins, Distance: 385 km, Cost: $19)
* Check in at The Fairmont Dallas (Cost: $209/night, Distance: 0.4 miles from Dallas city center, Allows children under 10)
* Visit the Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Garden (Cost: $15/adult, $10/child aged 3-12, Free for children under 3)
* Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant in Dallas

Day 3 - March 7th, 2022

* Take a taxi from Dallas to the Dallas World Aquarium (Cost: $15/taxi, Distance: 1.4 miles)
* Visit the Dallas World Aquarium (Cost: $25/adult, $18/child aged 3-12, Free for children under 3)
* Have lunch at a nearby restaurant
* Spend the afternoon exploring the Bishop Arts District and shopping at its boutiques
* Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant in Dallas

Day 4 - March 8th, 2022

* Fly from Dallas to Pittsburgh on F3673723 (Price: $461, DepTime: 11:24, ArrTime: 14:44, ActualElapsedTime: 2 hours 20 minutes)
* Check in at The Westin Pittsburgh (Cost: $199/night, Distance: 0.5 miles from Pittsburgh city center, Allows children under 10)
* Spend the afternoon exploring Pittsburgh's city center and visiting the Andy Warhol Museum (Cost: $20/adult, $10/child aged 3-12, Free for children under 3)
* Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant in Pittsburgh

Day 5 - March 9th, 2022

* Spend the morning exploring the Phipps Conservatory and Botanical Gardens (Cost: $15/adult, $10/child aged 3-12, Free for children under 3)
* Take a taxi from Pittsburgh to the airport (Cost: $15/taxi, Distance: 1.4 miles)
* Fly back home on F3691487 (Price: $374, DepTime: 14:49, ArrTime: 18:06, ActualElapsedTime: 2 hours 17 minutes)

Total Cost for the 5-day trip: $15,982

Note: The cost calculations include accommodation, transportation, and activity costs. However, they do not account for other expenses such as food, tips, or incidentals. Additionally, please note that the itinerary is subject to change based on availability and other factors. It's important to double-check with the service providers and ticket sellers for any changes in schedule or prices.
